DOC.brief_title: Fractional Flow Reserve ( FFR ) Versus Intravascular Ultrasound ( IVUS ) Intermediate Coronary Artery Disease
DOC.detailed_description: This trial prospective , randomize , open label , two arm design multi-center trial . When diagnostic coronary angiogram show target lesion intermediate stenosis , IVUS and/or FFR perform order decide PCI defer 1:1 randomization . The patient would follow 2 year clinically .
